io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets

Class DispatchException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets.DispatchException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DispatchException
extends RuntimeException
    Exception used to indicate that a functional dispatch failed. Typically it would preserve the exceptions from the attempted invocations in its Throwable.getSuppressed() list.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes

      static class  DispatchException.InvalidResult
      An exception that denotes that there was a problem with the invocation result.
